column4: This guy I am helping is getting crazy slow downloads from "apt-get update" and any aptget installs. Any one know why? He says that he has dsl and it is working fine
Any chance his DSL is piped through a router?
he has another windows comp that is behind the router too though

Get him to try a direct connection from the DSL modem to the ubuntu-comp. If that fixes it, it's a port forwarding issue; see if he can't get his router to enable upnp, or find/forward the ports apt-get might be using.
